alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Greene; King George; Madison; Orange; Rappahannock; Spotsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 9:52AM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation 2 to 4 inches in the suburbs of Washington DC with 1 to 3 inches for other areas. However, snow accumulation around a coating to 1 inch is most likely across extreme southern Maryland into the Virginia Piedmont. * WHERE...Portions of southern Maryland, northern Virginia, and the Virginia Piedmont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper; Greene; King George; Madison; Orange; Rappahannock; Spotsylvania
